publ: by Michele Jordan Under the Oak Consulting, LLC
name: CyberRadar
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The CND Cyber Threat Intelligence (Radar Console) provides Alerts for recent vulnerabilities in a variety of products. Alerts are a hand-curated list of the most recent vulnerabilities and/or patches in Networking, OS, ICS/SCADA, Healthcare, Building Management, Automobile, and other areas, provided each weekday. We pick the top 5 Alerts from the day for you to hear in each Flash Briefing.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
